trans-unit.source: Represents the method that handles the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowCommand"></xref> event of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 表示处理的方法<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowCommand"></xref>事件<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowCommand> event is raised when a button within the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowCommand>中的按钮时引发事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件被单击。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowCommand>

trans-unit.source: This allows you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine whenever this event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 这使您可以提供每次此事件发生时执行的自定义的例程的事件处理方法。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control also raises other specialized events when certain buttons are clicked (buttons with the `CommandName` property set to "Delete", "Update", and "Page" for example).
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;><xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件还将引发单击某些按钮时的其他专用的事件 (与按钮`CommandName`属性设为"删除"、"更新"和"页上"，示例)。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: When using one of these buttons, you should consider handling one of the specialized events provided by the control (such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDeleted> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDeleting>).
trans-unit.target: 在使用这些按钮之一时，应考虑处理由控件提供的专用事件之一 (如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDeleted>或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDeleting>)。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDeleting> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDeleted>

trans-unit.source: When you create a GridViewCommandEventHandler delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: 当创建 GridViewCommandEventHandler 委托时，需要标识将处理该事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: 若要将事件与事件处理程序关联，添加到事件的委托的一个实例。

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: 除非移除了该委托，称为每当发生该事件时，事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [NIB: Events and Delegates](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).
trans-unit.target: 有关事件处理程序委托的详细信息，请参阅[NIB︰ 事件和委托](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115)。
